backend/main.mo: Minimal actor importing and including a blob storage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report indicating the Mineral Water menu item price update in menuData.ts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of multiple frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining extensive OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata, social tags, favicon, and script mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout and all page routes including /search.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Brand logo component with fallback text mark when the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/GalleryImage.tsx: Displays a gallery image with loading skeleton, hover effects, and error fallback card.
frontend/src/components/HeaderSearch.tsx: Header search form with input, icon, and submit button calling onSubmit.
frontend/src/components/LogoMotif.tsx: Decorative logo motif with opacity and text fallback if image fails.
frontend/src/components/MenuCategoryCaro: Interactive menu category carousel with keyboard, swipe navigation, and price badges.
frontend/src/components/MenuScreenshotGa: Simple viewer showing the first menu screenshot with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Wrapper component providing consistent vertical spacing and container layout.
frontend/src/components/Seo.tsx: React component that updates document title and meta/OG tags when props change.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Restaurant footer with brand section, social links, quick links, and contact info layout.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, search, mobile menu, and CTAs for ordering and booking.
frontend/src/components/WatermarkBackgro: Renders fixed layered watermark background images with low opacity for subtle texture.
frontend/src/data/menuData.ts: Exports structured menu categories and items for juices, salads, soups, and more.
frontend/src/draft24-exclusions.md: Notes which changes from other drafts were excluded and documents the restored Draft 24 feature set.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useHorizontalSwipe.ts: Hook providing left/right swipe detection via touch events and returns a ref for binding.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login flow, identity storage, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for adding React Query hooks; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, custom color variables, typography, and dark mode theming.
frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts: Exports paths for brand images and a list of gallery images with alt text.
frontend/src/lib/globalSearchContent.ts: Builds search results across menu items, offers, and site pages using text normalization and keyword matching.
frontend/src/lib/menuPdf.ts: Empty file reserved for future menu PDF utilities.
frontend/src/lib/menuPrice.ts: Formats menu item prices, supporting numeric, labeled, and fallback cases.
frontend/src/lib/menuScreenshotAssets.ts: Exports a deterministic ordered list of menu screenshot asset URLs.
frontend/src/lib/socialLinks.ts: Stores canonical social media profile URLs for the brand.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata, story sections, values, and styled layout components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with restaurant details, quick actions, and a map section using various UI components.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage featuring hero content, cuisines list, calls to action, and branded visuals.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Implements the menu page with search filtering, menu screenshots, and a category carousel.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Displays a list of promotional offers with styled cards and a terms section.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Provides global site search with grouped results for menu items, offers, and pages.
frontend/src/types/pdf-lib-global.d.ts: Empty type declaration file for pdf-lib globals.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions such as custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature states, and a pending request to update the Mineral Water item price to â‚¹20.
